info.title: Skills & Abilities:
info.description:
Excellent leadership qualities and strong financial skills developed through student
    leadership, volunteer experiences, and work
    Strong verbal/written communication and interpersonal skills built through customer-employee
    relationships in a fast paced work environment
    Five years experience in serving customers in a timely manner

info.title: Technical Knowledge:
info.description:
Exceptional with MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Publisher, Outlook)
    Knowledge of and experienced with C, Java, HTML, JAVASCRIPT, MATLAB and VB.Net
    developed through self study and school courses

info.description:
Storefront/Baker – Tim Hortons

    • Preparing food orders and working efficiently as a team
    • Efficiently handling cash and other forms of payments
    • Cleanup and Setup of Tim Horton’s merchandise
    • Supervising staff and maintaining service

info.title: Academic Projects:
info.description:
MATLAB
    Image Stitching: combined multiple images with overlapping fields of view to produce a
    segmented panorama
    HTML / CSS / JavaScript / AngularJS
    To-do List: Lets a user create a list of things to-do, can be arranged to a completed list and may
    remove from the list
    Reverse Geolocating: Used API and location coordinates to find the location along with its
    distance from current location
    Weather Application: Finds 5 days and hourly weather at the location declared by user
    VB.Net
    Alarm Clock: Allows user to create an alarm that will ring to the selected tune of their choice at
    the time set
    C with OpenGL
    Interactive Interior Design Program: 3D environment created that allowed first or third person
    view for the character created, along with objects/obstacles
